item.title: VALLEY NATIONAL BANCORP 10-K
item.description: VALLEY NATIONAL BANCORP, which is in the National Commercial Banks [6021] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 01, 2023 had 60733 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2022 - 910 instances loans - 736 instances valley - 704 instances december - 608 instances 31 - 596 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
